name: Quick Tiles
description: Quick Tiles is another bright and interesting puzzle game in which you don't need to drag and drop elements, just swap them by clicking on them with the mouse. The game has 20 levels, each puzzle consists of 45 elements. In this version, buttons have been added to the panel: sound, mute, hint, next level and exit to the main menu. With the right decision, you will automatically go to the next level, but if the passage of the level caused you difficulty, then you can skip it. The game has a choice of levels and you can start playing from any level. The difficulty of the game is medium, suitable for both adults and children.
